item.title: Dfs Emote [HARDCODED]
item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
item.description:
@DemisePking wrote:

This is runescapes new DFS emote.
You need SWAT’s new header.

Download this animation file
http://uppit.com/yuyadh8h986t/1678.dat

And add this in your class20 with all the other animations

if(j == 6696){ //dfs spec int file = 1678; if(FrameStart[file] < 1) Class36.methodCustomAnimations1(false, file); int[] frames = {213,222,221,223,224,225,219,218,219,218,219,218,219,218,219,218,219,218,219,218,219,217,214,215,220,0}; int[] delays = {5,5,5,5,5,5,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,5,5,5,5,0}; aClass20Array351[j].anInt352 = frames.length-1; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353 = new int[frames.length-1]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354 = new int[frames.length-1]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355 = new int[frames.length-1]; for(int i2 = 0; i2 < frames.length-1; i2++){ aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353[i2] = frames[i2]+FrameStart[file]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354[i2] = -1; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355[i2] = delays[i2]; } }

Read full topic
